11.3.1 Python å®ç°é«˜æ–¯å…¬å¼

import numpy as np
from scipy import integrate

def gauss_formula_sphere(P, Q, R, radius):
    """
    è®¡ç®—çƒé¢ä¸Šçš„é«˜æ–¯å…¬å¼
    P, Q, R: å‘é‡åœºçš„ä¸‰ä¸ªåˆ†é‡å‡½æ•°
    radius: çƒçš„åŠå¾„
    """
    # è®¡ç®—æ•£åº¦
    def divergence(x, y, z):
        h = 1e-6
        divP = (P(x+h, y, z) - P(x-h, y, z)) / (2*h)
        divQ = (Q(x, y+h, z) - Q(x, y-h, z)) / (2*h)
        divR = (Q(x, y, z+h) - R(x, y, z-h)) / (2*h)
        return divP + divQ + divR
    
    # çƒåæ ‡å˜æ¢
    def integrand(rho, phi, theta):
        x = rho * np.sin(phi) * np.cos(theta)
        y = rho * np.sin(phi) * np.sin(theta)
        z = rho * np.cos(phi)
        return divergence(x, y, z) * rho**2 * np.sin(phi)
    
    # ä¸‰é‡ç§¯åˆ†
    result, error = integrate.tplquad(
        integrand,
        0, 2*np.pi,           # theta
        0, np.pi,             # phi
        0, radius             # rho
    )
    
    return result, error

# ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼šè®¡ç®—æ•£åº¦ä¸º 3(x^2 + y^2 + z^2) çš„æƒ…å†µ
def P(x, y, z): return x**3 + y**3 + z**3
def Q(x, y, z): return x**3 + y**3 + z**3
def R(x, y, z): return x**3 + y**3 + z**3

result, error = gauss_formula_sphere(P, Q, R, radius=1.0)
print(f"ç»“æœ: {result:.6f}, è¯¯å·®: {error:.2e}")
# ç†è®ºå€¼: 12Ï€/5 â‰ˆ 7.539822

11.3.2 Mathematica å®ç°æ–¯æ‰˜å…‹æ–¯å…¬å¼

(* å®šä¹‰å‘é‡åœº *)
F = {y - z, z - x, x - y};

(* è®¡ç®—æ—‹åº¦ *)

(* å®šä¹‰æ›²é¢ï¼šå¹³é¢ x + y + z = 0 å†…çš„åœ†ç›˜ *)
S = {r Cos[Î¸], r Sin[Î¸], -r Cos[Î¸] - r Sin[Î¸]};

(* å‚æ•°èŒƒå›´ *)
region = {r, 0, a} && {Î¸, 0, 2Ï€};

(* è®¡ç®—æ³•å‘é‡ *)

(* æ›²é¢ç§¯åˆ† *)

  curl . n, 
  {r, 0, a}, {Î¸, 0, 2Ï€}
];

(* æ›²çº¿ç§¯åˆ†ï¼ˆè¾¹ç•Œï¼‰ *)

  F . D[boundaryPath, t],
  {t, 0, 2Ï€}
];

(* éªŒè¯ *)
Simplify[surfaceIntegral - lineIntegral] (* åº”è¯¥ä¸º 0 *)
